TEMP_comment: Ship CTD temperature used to correct mooring SBE sensors
PSAL_comment: Salinity compared with corrected ship CTD salinity at 2 different times. Ship CTD salinity corrected by comparing with bottle salinity from the deepest depth. Salinity correction is linear. Salinity corrected by -0.00219  to all data at that depth.

GLOBAL_keywords: Oceans > Ocean Chemistry > Carbon Dioxide > Carbon Dioxide Partial Pressure
GLOBAL_institution: University of Bergen / Geophysical Institute; Norwegian Research Centre AS (NORCE)
PCOW_comment: The xCO2 and pCO2 from sensor have been postprocessed at factory (corrected for drift). The pCO2 was converted to fCO2 by using SBE temperature and pressure data from the carbon sensor.  Furthermore	 the post processed pCO2 data have been compared to discrete fCO2 data	 which were calculated from discrete DIC and TA data. Discrete DIC and TA samples were collected at 4 cruises over the period when the mooring was deployed (Aug 2020 - Jul 2021).  The carbon sensor data was corrected by subtracting 19.92 uatm from the sensor fCO2 data.
